# Getting Help with CodePause

## Documentation

- [README](../README.md) - Overview and quick start
- [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md) - How to contribute
- [Architecture](../docs/ARCHITECTURE.md) - Technical details

## Questions & Help

### Before Asking

1. Check the [FAQ](../README.md#frequently-asked-questions)
2. Search [existing issues](https://github.com/codepause-dev/codepause-extension/issues)
3. Search [discussions](https://github.com/codepause-dev/codepause-extension/discussions)

### Where to Ask

- **GitHub Discussions**: Best for questions, ideas, and general help
  - Go to: https://github.com/codepause-dev/codepause-extension/discussions

- **GitHub Issues**: For bugs and feature requests only
  - Go to: https://github.com/codepause-dev/codepause-extension/issues

- **Email**: For private/security matters
  - Email: support@codepause.dev

## Reporting Bugs

1. Use our [bug report template](https://github.com/codepause-dev/codepause-extension/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml)
2. Include:
   - CodePause version
   - VS Code version
   - Operating system
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Error logs (Output â†’ CodePause)

## Feature Requests

1. Use our [feature request template](https://github.com/codepause-dev/codepause-extension/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml)
2. Explain the problem you're trying to solve
3. Describe your proposed solution

## Security Issues

**Do NOT report security issues publicly!**

Email: security@codepause.dev

See [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) for details.

## Response Times

- Bug reports: Within 48 hours
- Feature requests: Within 1 week
- Questions: Within 24-48 hours
- Security issues: Within 24 hours

## Community

- Star the repo to show support
- Share with fellow developers
- Contribute code or documentation

Thank you for using CodePause!
